name: Chemung Financial Corporation
description: Chemung Financial Corporation is a diversified financial services company headquartered in Elmira, New York. Established in 1867, Chemung Financial operates through its principal subsidiary, Chemung Canal Trust Company, which provides a full range of banking and financial services to individuals, businesses, and municipalities. The corporation offers traditional banking services, including checking and savings accounts, loans, and mortgages, while also providing investment management, insurance, and financial planning services. With a commitment to community engagement, Chemung Financial focuses on building strong relationships with its clients and enhancing the financial well-being of the regions it serves. The company places significant emphasis on customer service and integrity, striving to be the financial institution of choice in its markets. Through strategic growth initiatives, including technological advancements and community outreach, Chemung Financial aims to adapt to the evolving needs of its customers while maintaining a strong foundation of trust and reliability. The corporation is dedicated to fostering economic development in its communities and supporting local initiatives.

seo.meta_title: Chemung Financial Corporation | Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Chemung Financial Corporation, a trusted provider of banking and financial services in New York. Learn about our commitment to community and customer service.

faq.question: What services does Chemung Financial Corporation provide?
faq.answer: Chemung Financial Corporation provides banking services, wealth management, insurance, and financial planning.

faq.question: Where is Chemung Financial Corporation headquartered?
faq.answer: Chemung Financial Corporation is headquartered in Elmira, New York, USA.

faq.question: When was Chemung Financial Corporation founded?
faq.answer: Chemung Financial Corporation was founded in 1867.
